name: The Museum of Natural Mystery
description:
"WHERE ARE ALL THE KIDS??" 

Shelly Wigler III, Turtle Detective, knows something is up. On what should be the busiest day of the year at the museum, not a kid is in sight. Uncovering the truth can only be done with your help!

Come join Shelly as you sneak out of the turtle pond, avoid security guards, and  stealthily gather clues that reveals the secret at The Museum of Natural Mystery!
